DOC.brief_summary: Based on multi-center clinical research resources, a large-scale prospective cohort study will be conduted to make a more accurate diagnosis and intervention plan of Non-immune fetal hydrops (NIFH), and then establish NIFH accurate treatment strategy which is suitable for China's national conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Precision Medical Research of Non-immune Fetal Hydrops (NIFH)-From Prenatal Diagnosis to Intrauterine Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: 1. Etiological study of Non-immune fetal hydrops(NIFH): 1. Etiological study of NIFH in mid-pregnancy period; 2. Etiological study of NIFH and hygroma colli in first trimester; 3. Value assessment of technology for exome sequencing in diagnosis of NIFH; 2. The accuracy of NIFH intrauterine intervention and its effect assessment: 1. Perinatal outcomes of NIFH ; 2. The effect of intrauterine treatments.
DOC.criteria: Cases corresponding to diagnosis standards Willing to accept the regular followup Immune hydrops fetalis Multiple pregnancy, except for twintotwin transfusion syndrome IV
